query.name: dsB2BFilledQuestionnaireList
query.sql:
SELECT $NEEDDISTINCT #result('T.ID', 'java.lang.Long', 'FILLEDQUESTIONNAIREID') ,#result('T.DECLARATIONNUMBER', 'java.lang.String', 'DECLARATIONNUMBER') ,#result('T.STATUS', 'java.lang.String', 'STATUS') ,#result("CONCAT(T.LASTNAME, CONCAT(' ', CONCAT(T.FIRSTNAME, CONCAT(' ', T.PATRONYMIC))))", 'java.lang.String', 'FIO') ,#result('T.FILLDATE', 'java.lang.String', 'FILLDATE') ,#result('answer_component.STRINGVALUE', 'java.lang.String', 'DATEOFBIRTH') ,#result('PROD.NAME', 'java.lang.String', 'PRODUCTNAME')
$ASPECTFIELDS FROM UW_FILLEDQUESTIONNAIRE T LEFT JOIN UW_ANSWER answer ON T.ID = answer.FILLEDQUESTIONNAIREID AND answer.QUESTIONID = 2 LEFT JOIN UW_ANSWERCOMPONENT answer_component ON answer.ID = answer_component.ANSWERID
JOIN UW_QUESTIONNAIREVERSION qv ON qv.ID = T.QUESTIONNAIREVERSIONID JOIN UW_QUESTIONNAIREBYPRODUCTS qv2prod ON qv2prod.QUESTIONNAIREVERSIONID = qv.ID JOIN B2B_PRODCONF CONF ON qv2prod.PRODCONFID = CONF.PRODCONFID JOIN B2B_PRODVER PVER ON PVER.PRODVERID = CONF.PRODVERID JOIN B2B_PROD PROD ON PVER.PRODID = PROD.PRODID $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CUSTOMWHERE) $CUSTOMWHERE #end #chunk($fromDate) T.FILLDATE >= #bind($fromDate, 'DATE') #end #chunk($toDate) T.FILLDATE <= #bind($toDate, 'DATE') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end

query.name: dsB2BFilledQuestionnaireListCount
query.sql:
SELECT #result('COUNT($NEEDDISTINCT T.ID)', 'java.lang.Long', 'CNT') FROM UW_FILLEDQUESTIONNAIRE T LEFT JOIN UW_ANSWER answer ON T.ID = answer.FILLEDQUESTIONNAIREID AND answer.QUESTIONID = 2 LEFT JOIN UW_ANSWERCOMPONENT answer_component ON answer.ID = answer_component.ANSWERID
JOIN UW_QUESTIONNAIREVERSION qv ON qv.ID = T.QUESTIONNAIREVERSIONID JOIN UW_QUESTIONNAIREBYPRODUCTS qv2prod ON qv2prod.QUESTIONNAIREVERSIONID = qv.ID JOIN B2B_PRODCONF CONF ON qv2prod.PRODCONFID = CONF.PRODCONFID JOIN B2B_PRODVER PVER ON PVER.PRODVERID = CONF.PRODVERID JOIN B2B_PROD PROD ON PVER.PRODID = PROD.PRODID $ASPECTTABLES #chain('AND' 'WHERE') #chunk($CUSTOMWHERE) $CUSTOMWHERE #end #chunk($fromDate) T.FILLDATE >= #bind($fromDate, 'DATE') #end #chunk($toDate) T.FILLDATE <= #bind($toDate, 'DATE') #end $ASPECTRESTRICTION #end
